The claim stated that India: s debt to the World Bank has been paid in full by PM Modi.
The expert: s verdict clarified that the claim was based on a viral message on social media.
The expert analyzed a tweet by India: s permanent representative at the United Nations, Syed Akbaruddin, which was used to support the claim.
The expert pointed out that Akbaruddin: s tweet was actually referring to the fulfillment of dues to the United Nations, not loans repaid to the World Bank.
